Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:01.20]There's no light, no light in the sky
[00:07.66]And it gets so cold when she leaves my side
[00:12.87]Maybe she's the light, the light in my eyes
[00:19.53]Cause everything looks old and tired when she leaves my side
[00:24.68] 
[00:26.75]I know, I know, I know, I know you got to leave
[00:32.40]So I'll bite my tongue until that fucker bleeds
[00:38.59]Yeah, I know, I know, I know, I can be alright
[00:44.28]But see, you set my sun, so here comes the night
[00:49.69]Here comes the night, here comes the night
[00:56.55]Yeah, I know, I know, I know, I can be alright
[01:01.70]Here comes the night, here comes the night
[01:10.70]Here comes the night
[01:12.24]
